title: There will be pod
author: VD
content_html:
I just thought those who were interested in a Voxonomics podcast might like to know that I completed my first interview today. I may have a voice for literature, but I was pleased at how substantive it was. I think I’ll be posting the podcasts on either Thursdays or Fridays, does anyone have any preferences in that regard?

Also, is there anyone you be particularly interested in having me interview? Please send me contact details as well as the name if there’s someone you’re seriously interested in hearing, as that will make the interview rather more likely if I don’t have to dig around just to get in contact with them.
content_text:
I just thought those who were interested in a Voxonomics podcast might like to know that I completed my first interview today.  I may have a voice for literature, but I was pleased at how substantive it was.  I think I’ll be posting the podcasts on either Thursdays or Fridays, does anyone have any preferences in that regard?
Also, is there anyone you be particularly interested in having me interview?  Please send me contact details as well as the name if there’s someone you’re seriously interested in hearing, as that will make the interview rather more likely if I don’t have to dig around just to get in contact with them.
